page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF YVONNE
page.content: My name is Yvonne Taylor. I am twelve years old.I live at{Bullions Farm {Crombie.}I get out of bed at five to seven in the morning.I take the dog for a walk, have my breakfast and then my little brother and I walk a mile to Crombie Primary School. We have lunch there as it is too far to walk home. It takes us about twenty minutes to walk to school. When I get home after school,I tidy my room, get changed and go out to see my dad who works on the farm. I do not have any children of my age to play with at night, as all my friends live in Crombie. It can be lonely sometimes. Next year I shall be going to Woodmill High School and shall have to leave the house even earlier in the morning to catch the School bus.
